page.title: 12THE CANAL
page.content: THE CANAL WAS OPENED ABOUT 1818 AND WENT FROM KENDAL TO LANCASTER.A BOAT WOULD NOT GET THROUGH TODAY AS THERE ARE SOME CULVERTS FOR THE NEW ROADS TO CROSS THE CANAL.MOST PEOPLE WHO USE THE CANAL GO FOR WALKS ALONG THE BANK.SOME SCOUTS GO CANOEING ON IT.IT IS ILLEGAL TO GO FISHING WITHOUT A LICENCE,BUT SOME PEOPLE DO.YOU CAN CATCH TROUT,PIKE,EELS AND ROACH.ABOUT SIX MONTHS AGO IT WAS DRAINED OFF TO BE FIXED.IN SOME PARTS IT IS CONCRETE BECAUSE OF PREVIOUS LEAKS.IT HAS JUNK AND GLASS AT THE BOTTOM SO IT IS BETTER NOT TO GO SWIMMING IN IT ALTHOUGH SOME PEOPLE DO.
